DOC.brief_title: Anesthesia Flexible Bronchoscopy Lung Cancer Diagnostic
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective randomized study analyze 80 patient underwent flexible bronchoscopy . Patients randomly assign four group 20 patient accord anesthetic combination use : 200 mg topical lidocaine ( LID group ) ; 200 mg topical lidocaine 2 mg/kg propofol ( PPF group ) ; 200 mg topical lidocaine 20 mcg/kg alfentanil ( ALF group ) ; 200 mg topical lidocaine 0.05 mg/kg midazolam ( MID group ) . Scores assign patient accord different variable observe endoscopic procedure ; low score , low complication index .
